title: 15 Minute Guided Meditation  ♥ Mindfully Heal Yourself From The Inside Out
description:
This short guided meditation is the perfect way to welcome peace and mindfulness into your life. A gentle and calming guided meditation will allow you to dig a little deeper to connect with the colourless, non physical earth element of our being, space. Moving through a few visualization techniques, this video will give you the opportunity to let go of all that no longer serves you. The negativity, stress, anxiety....whatever is holding you back in your life. Let this class take you on a meditative journey to cleanse and heal yourself from the inside out. 

🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 
https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

Meditation, Yoga, & Fitness Programs: https://bohobeautiful.life/our-store 

So find a quiet space, put some headphones on, close your eyes, and enjoy. 

Love & Light...
Juliana & Mark**

channelDescription:
Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.


Your Decisions Today Will Define Your Tomorrow.

Thank you. I am going through the worst time in my life. Cancer. Loss of job. Loss of relationship. Yet every morning I am at the beach listening to your gifts of love.

To whoever is reading this: Sending love and hugs to all of you. Remember that you are loved. You are not alone in fighting your battles. We are here for you and we love you. The universe got your back. Trust in the divine process of life. You will definitely find peace, strength, love, and happiness. Stay safe ❤️

Scrolled down to leave a comment about my experiences during this meditation, and it's heartening to read many others were touched by it as well. Had tears rolling down my cheeks when you said to imagine my parents next to me. My dad died a few months ago and I miss him very much. It was nice to just sit and feel his warmth surrounding me, even though he is no longer here. Thank you for this wonderful experience <3

Such a beautiful meditation experience. I’m currently water fasting and needed something to help me stay relaxed and focused. May God bless you and your family. To anyone reading… May God send nothing but great things your way. ♥️✨🙏🏼 Thank you!
